::: {.callout-note} This is the list of my academic publications. I try as much as possible to publish in open access journals. However, if you can not find the associated PDF, please contact me. I will glady send it to you! ::: ```{r} #| warning: false #| message: false #| eval: true library(tidyverse) library(httr2) library(gt) library(glue) key <- Sys.getenv("ZOTERO_KEY") res <- request("https://api.zotero.org/users/5837870/publications/items/") |> req_headers( "Zotero-API-Version" = "3", "Zotero-API-Key" = key, "Accept" = "application/json" ) |> req_url_query(limit = 100, sort = "date", direction = "desc") |> req_perform() |> resp_body_json(simplifyVector = TRUE) |> as_tibble() dat <- res$data |> as_tibble() |> mutate(authors = map_chr(creators, ~ toString(paste(.$firstName, .$lastName)))) |> filter(authors != "") |> mutate(year = str_match(date, "\\d{4}")) |> mutate(across(where(is.character), \(x) replace_na(x, ""))) |> mutate(DOI = case_when( DOI == "" ~ "", TRUE ~ "View article" )) |> mutate(row = glue("

{title}

{authors}, {publicationTitle} ({year}) {DOI}

")) |> select(row) dat |> gt() |> fmt_markdown(everything()) |> cols_align(align = "left") |> tab_options( data_row.padding = px(20), column_labels.hidden = TRUE ) |> tab_style( style = cell_borders( sides = c("top", "bottom"), color = "#2C3E50", weight = px(2), style = "solid" ), locations = cells_body( columns = everything(), rows = everything() ) ) |> opt_table_outline(style = "none") ```
